name: lens
description: A powerful plugin that will allow you to attach a camera to your player and use its rich API for some cool effects.

scripts.build-dist: npx webpack && uglifyjs dist/lens.min.mjs -m -c --comments -o dist/lens.min.mjs && node version-handler.js && esdoc -c esdoc.json
scripts.update-version-major: npm version major && npm run build-dist
scripts.update-version-minor: npm version minor && npm run build-dist
scripts.update-version-patch: npm version patch && npm run build-dist
